Documentation Updates

Below are documentation updates for August-September 2022.

Index of all documentation updates

30-September-2022

Major updates

  • Title: Live API Reference
  • Description: Add new passphrase field for SRT captions
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/references/reference.html#tag/Live-Jobs/operation/CreateALiveJob
  • Category:
  • Title: CMS API Reference
  • Description: New endpoint for deleting an image of any kind. Also removed deprecated endpoints for deleting poster and thumbnail
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/reference.html#tag/Videos/operation/DeleteVideoImage
  • Category:
  • Title: Domains and Ports that Must Be Accessible to Video Cloud
  • Description: New section about protocols for live added.
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/general/domains-and-ports-must-be-accessible-video-cloud.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Using Page Layouts
  • Description: Update that redirect page layout works with web, iOS and Android
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/using-page-layouts.html#Redirect_link
  • Category:
  • Title: Getting Started with Brightcove Video Connect for Adobe Experience Manager
  • Description: Added info on the 6.0.1 release of the connector
  • Link: https://integrations.support.brightcove.com/adobe/getting-started-brightcove-video-connect-adobe-experience-manager.html
  • Category:

Minor updates

  • Title: Overview: China Delivery
  • Description: Android will support China Delivery at a later date
  • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/general/china-delivery-overview.html

  • Title: China Delivery with the Native SDKs
  • Description: Android will support China Delivery at a later date
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/features/china-delivery-sdks.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Overview: Data Collection API
  • Description: Indicate the requests that must include video duration
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/data-collection/getting-started/overview-data-collection-api-v2.html#VOD_and_Live_Events
  • Category:
  • Title: XML Manifest for Ingestion via MRSS/Aspera
  • Description: Remove remoteasset field, add note that for customfield values, custom field must exist or ingest request will fail
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/mrss-ingestion/getting-started/xml-manifest-for-ingestion-via-mrss.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Dolby Atmos Audio
  • Description: Added note on support for Dolby Atmos on Android (via the Android SDK)
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/ingest-profiles/guides/dolby-atmos-audio.html#limitations
  • Category:

2-September-2022

New Docs

  • Title: Adding Pages to Playlists
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create secondary pages and add them to playlists. This gives you the option to have an asset in a playlist that when clicked shows a new page.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/adding-pages-to-playlists.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Managing Secondary Pages
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create, delete and edit secondary pages.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/managing-secondary-pages.html
  • Category:
  • Title: OTT Catalog Export
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use templates and jobs to generate data reports needed for various platforms search implementations.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/ott-catalog-export.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Using View All Pages
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to create, delete and edit default and custom view all pages. A view all page is used when the number of videos in a carousel meets a maximum threshold. When the threshold is exceeded, a View All link is displayed and when the link is clicked by the customer a new page appears displaying all videos, for instance in a grid.
  • Link: https://beacon-help.support.brightcove.com/layout/using-view-all.html
  • Category:
  • Title: Bumper Videos
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to implement bumper videos, that is videos that play before the main content video.
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/bumper-videos.html
  • Category:
